document_data.mainbody: asilik was one of the Blades of the Old Man as of . He was tall, the only one who could look Sauk eye to eye, though he was not as robust otherwise. Pale and long-haired, he had a barbarians look, but he had been just muscle for a guild from Waterdeep before Alaodin took him in. He took a vigil on the night of Tarsakh 19 on the orders of the Old Man of the Mountain at the Garden of Winged Horses in Sentinelspire. By the next day, his remains were found on the Star Fountain. Identification was not completely conclusive, but he wasnt seen again.
